public class GroovyAwareInfrastructureAdvisorAutoProxyCreator
extends org.springframework.aop.framework.autoproxy.InfrastructureAdvisorAutoProxyCreator

Tells Spring always to proxy Groovy classes.

Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.2
